verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> came to <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; I was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>, and I was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for her with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>fury<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; I am <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and will <S%H7931>live<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%>; and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; There shall yet old <S%H2205>men<s%> and old <S%H2205>women<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4938>staff<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H7230>very<s%> <S%H3117>age<s%>.
And the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3206>boys<s%> and <S%H3207>girls<s%> <S%H7832>playing<s%> in the streets <S%H7339>there<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; If it be <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> in these <S%H3117>days<s%>, should it also be <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>? <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H3467>Behold<s%>, I will save my <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, and from the <S%H3996>west<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>;

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7931>them<s%>, and they shall live in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and they shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be their <S%H430>God<s%>, in <S%H571>truth<s%> and in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; Let your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, you that <S%H8085>hear<s%> in these <S%H3117>days<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, which were in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> was <S%H3245>laid<s%>, that the <S%H1964>temple<s%> might be <S%H1129>built<s%>.

For <S%H6440>before<s%> these <S%H3117>days<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> no <S%H7939>hire<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%>, nor any <S%H7939>hire<s%> for <S%H929>animal<s%>; neither was there any <S%H7965>peace<s%> to him that went <S%H3318>out<s%> or came <S%H935>in<s%> because of the <S%H6862>affliction<s%>: for I <S%H7971>set<s%> all <S%H120>men<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>.
But now I will not be unto the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> as in the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

For the <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H7965>prosperous<s%>; the <S%H1612>vine<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, and the <S%H776>ground<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H2981>increase<s%>, and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> their <S%H2919>dew<s%>; and I will cause the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> to possess all these <S%H5157>things<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H7045>pass<s%>, that as you were a curse among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; so will I <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H1293>you<s%>, and you shall be a blessing: <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3027>not<s%>, but let your hands be <S%H2388>strong<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; As I <S%H2161>thought<s%> to <S%H7489>punish<s%> <S%H1>you<s%>, when your fathers provoked me to <S%H7107>wrath<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and I repented <S%H5162>not<s%>:

So <S%H7725>again<s%> have I <S%H2161>thought<s%> in these <S%H3117>days<s%> to do <S%H3190>well<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: fear <S%H3372>not<s%>.

These are the <S%H1697>things<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do<s%>; <S%H1696>Speak<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>; <S%H8199>execute<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> in your <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

And let <S%H376>none<s%> of you <S%H2803>imagine<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>; and <S%H157>love<s%> no <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%>: for all these are things that I <S%H8130>hate<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; The <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H6685>month<s%>, and the fast of the <S%H2549>fifth<s%>, and the <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%>, and the <S%H6685>fast<s%> of the <S%H6224>tenth<s%>, shall be to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, and <S%H2896>cheerful<s%> <S%H4150>feasts<s%>; therefore <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; It shall yet come to <S%H935>pass<s%>, that there shall come <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>:

And the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> city shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H1980>speedily<s%> to <S%H2470>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: I will go <S%H3212>also<s%>.

<S%H7227>Yes<s%>, many <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and to <S%H2470>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; In those <S%H3117>days<s%> it shall come to <S%H6235>pass<s%>, that ten <S%H582>men<s%> shall take <S%H2388>hold<s%> out of all <S%H3956>languages<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, even shall take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of the <S%H3671>skirt<s%> of him that is a <S%H376>Jew<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We will <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H8085>you<s%>: for we have heard that God is with <S%H430>you<s%>.
